law.text: If a purchaser of all or any part of the land of a country club or golf course accepts the obligations of an agreement made under § 8-213 of this subtitle, the agreement is transferred to the purchaser. Property tax is not due under § 8-216 of this subtitle on a conveyance of land of a country club or golf course under this section.
